body:
Hi Ducan, The second major energy-performance feature of windows is the ability to control solar heat gain through the glazing. I have seen in your file two type of glazings: a) ProposedGlazing b) ExistingGlazing I don't know the characteristics of your materials. Have you also changed the SHGC?
I think you have not considered the influence of the SHGC. Bests Antonello
